##  Char Examples

<code>

        char c1 = 'D';

        char c1 = 122;

        char c2 = '\u0122';
</code>

<p class="fragment roll-in">Will this compile ? </p>
<p class="fragment roll-in">Answer: Yes </p>



note:
    - Yes. Integers are valid values, as wella s unicode
    - Open eclipse
    - See PrimitiveCharOne.java
